title: Games of the XXI Olympiad: Montreal 1976
creator_credit: Georges Dufaux, Jean Beaudin, Marcel Carriere, Ashley Murray and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The official film of the Games of the XXI Olympiad, Montreal, 1976. A unique special for world television audiences, it probes behind the scenes, capturing the emotional dimensions of the athlete and his or her sport. It highlights certain teams and participants, before, during and after their events. This film approaches each event with the intention of revealing the athlete as an individual.
